title: Something About You
description: Taz Vitali is finally living her dream. She’s a famous dancer at a prestigious ballet school, and nothing – and no one – is going to push her off her path. But then the gorgeous Teale shows up and throws her entire life out of balance. Not only does he remind her of the painful past she tried so hard to forget, but she also can’t stop when it comes to him. She can’t stop thinking about him. Can’t stop wanting him. And worst of all, she can’t seem to resist him, no matter how hard she tries. But losing herself in him means risking her dream, and neither one of them is prepared to give up who they are for what they want. Will Taz and Teale be able to defeat their past? “Something About You” is a sweet romance serial with lots of feels and second chances. This is PART ONE of this serial novel with 16k+ words. This book might contain some mild explicit language and mature content.
author: Fey Morano
